thread.title: Fluor Corporation Announces Quarterly Dividend

title: Fluor Corporation Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
Fluor Corporation Announces Quarterly Dividend Fluor Corporation 6 hours ago ÓÅ± Done 
IRVING, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Fluor Corporation's board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.21 per share on the company's common stock, payable October 2, 2015, to shareholders of record on September 2, 2015. 
About Fluor Corporation 
Fluor Corporation ( FLR ) is a global engineering and construction firm that designs and builds some of the world's most complex projects. The company creates and delivers innovative and integrated solutions for its clients in engineering, procurement, fabrication, construction, maintenance and project management on a global basis. For more than a century, Fluor has served clients in the energy, chemicals, government, industrial, infrastructure, mining and power market sectors. Headquartered in Irving, Texas, Fluor ranks 136 on the FORTUNE 500 list. With 40,000 employees worldwide, the company's revenue for 2014 was $21.5 billion. For more information, visit www.fluor.com or follow us on Twitter @FluorCorp . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150729006845/en/ Industrials
